results.title: Effects of metformin on behavioral alterations produced by chronic sucrose consumption in male rats.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on behavioral @<m>DISEASE_Dysgeusia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004408 @@@alterations@@@ produced by chronic @CHEMICAL_Sucrose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013395 @@@sucrose@@@ consumption in male @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Study of Diversity of Metformin Related Gastrointestinal Side Effects.
results.text_hl: This study is to estimate @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ related GI side effects in Indian population.

results.title: The Protective Effect of Metformin against Oxandrolone-Induced Infertility in Male Rats.
results.text_hl: However, co-administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Oxandrolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010074 @@@oxandrolone@@@ significantly ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Dysgeusia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004408 @@@toxicological alterations@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Oxandrolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010074 @@@oxandrolone@@@ exposure (ANOVA, P-value < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Abed AF, Jarrar YB, Al-Ameer HJ, Al-Awaida W, Lee SJ. The Protective Effect of Metformin against Oxandrolone-Induced Infertility in Male Rats. Curr Pharm Des. 2022;28(4):324-330. PMID: 33121403
